string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Yes, a colleague of mine is in need of your assistance.
Good luck stalker.
Tukarev %s Experiment
Harvest a %s and return it to Tukarev.
I need to perform an experiment on a particular mutant. I need you to hunt one down for me.
Find me a %s. I will reward you well if you succeed.
You have done well. This is exactly what I needed. Take this as your reward.
Find Missing Scientist
Search for the missing scientist.
One of my scientists is missing. He went out on a research expedition and never returned. Here is the area he was researching, search there and see if you can find him.
Thank you stalker.
Recover Stolen PDA for Tukarev
Tukarev had a PDA stolen that contained important research. Find it and return it to him.

Bandits broke into one of our mobile labs and looted it. One of the things they took was a PDA that has some research data on it that is very important. I have received a tip as to where they might have stashed it. Check it out. If you find the PDA I will reward you for its return.
Excellent! You have done well.
Search Jupiter Underground
Recover the research documents lost in Jupiter Underground.
One of our top scientists was killed in the underground passage while making his way back from Pripyat. He was carrying some important research with him. I need you to find it and bring it to me.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I need you to pay a visit to a stalker. Ask what you can do for him. He will pay you well.
Good luck stalker.
%s Arms Dealer
Loki needs %s delivered to him.
Freedom is having a difficult time maintaining a foot hold up here. I need weapons. Lots of them.
I need a few %ss. If you can find a way to get them up here past the Brain Scorcher I will be willing to pay.
You have done well. The more rifles I have the better I sleep. Take this payment.
Clear the Monolith Beachhead
Clear the designated area of any Monolith fighters in preparation for Freedom's main assault.
We are preparing an invasion of Monolith territory. I want you to clear an area for us so our main assault force can move in.
Well done! Now we can begin our invasion! Well, not now, later today... maybe tomorrow. Anyway, thanks bro.
Hunt for "%s" artefact for Loki
Loki has requested a %s to protect one of his men.
I'm sending one of the boys on a mission that will require him to have more protection than our best suits can offer. I need a particular artefact to protect him.
Bring me a "%s" artefact. If you can find one I will compensate you well for it.
Ah, perfect. Good job bro.
Search Monolith Control Center
Search the secret lab within Chernobyl NPP for documents relating to a prototype weapon.

There are rumors that plans for a new weapon exist inside a secret lab within Chernobyl NPP. We must retrieve them from the Monolith if we are to stand a chance against them. I know how grave the risks are, but if you are willing to capture the documents I will reward you well.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Someone has a job for you. You're going to see him and do what he says. Got it?
Good luck.
Retrieve Weapons Shipment
Klenov tasked you to find and bring the weapons shipment to the Container Warehouse in Jupiter.
We were supposed to get a shipment of weapons today, but Sultan's men hid it thanks to a military patrol. The location should be clear now, go get it.
You're a reliable man. Good job!
Kill the Enemy Scout
You've been tasked by Klenov to find and kill the enemy scout at any cost.
One of the enemy scouts informed a group of stalkers about the raid we were preparing. The result? three dead men. We can't risk another failure, so I want you to find and kill that fucker
Finally! Now we can prepare for our next hit. Here's your reward.
Escort the Bandit Spy
A undercover bandit needs to be extracted from the enemy troops, kill the other members of the squad and escort him back to the Klenov. The spy has a SVD.

Listen up. We have a source among the enemy troops. He has been informing us about their movement for a while now. However, nothing has been heard from him lately. He must have gone through some deep shit lately. Someone might blow his disguise up if we don't save his sorry ass soon. \nI need you to bring him back in one piece. Keep in mind that he's with other stalkers, you need to kill them first. You can recognize him by his rifle, a SVD, he will have to shoot you back when you attack the group so keep it in mind. Now go!
You both came back in one piece after all, heh? Just kidding. Take your money.
FUCK... Don't shoot! DON'T SHOOT! They are all dead! Let's get the fuck out and head back to Klenov. Come on, man...
We made it... fucking hell! Thanks buddy, I will go now.
Escort the Ecologists
The scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp.
We need an experienced stalker to lead a few of our the colleagues out into the field for study. Are you up for the task?
Thank you for your protection, stalker. Please take this as a token of our gratitude.
Find the "%s" artefact
You have been asked to retrieve the %s artefact. Bring it back to Tukarev if you happen to get your hands on one.
We are looking for certain kinds of artefacts. If you are interested, I will tell you what we need.
I need you to bring us back a "%s" artefact. You ever heard of it?
Great! You've found exactly what we are looking for. Take this suit; it offers great protection against the Zone, and I'm sure you’ll be able to command a good price for it.
Brains vs Brawn
Lead a group of Ecologist guards into battle against Bandits.

My researchers are in constant peril. There are bandits all over the area and no one seems to be doing a damn thing about it. I want you to clear the area with some of my men. Don't let their A-levels fool you, these boys know how to fight. Now get out there and lead them to victory!
Excellent work. Thank you.
Clear area of mutants

Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to lead a hunting party to reduce the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Trapper after the job is done.
I have organized a hunt to help keep the area around Jupiter a bit safer by depopulating the various mutant lairs found in area. I need someone experienced to lead it. Would you like the job?
Thank you, stalker. The area will be much safer for others because of you. Here is your payment.
Assassinate target
Trapper has a high value target that needs to be eliminated.
I have a dangerous threat that needs to be eliminated. Not a mutant this time, but a man. He will not be easy to get to but I promise to pay you well. Are you up for the job?
Excellent work stalker. Here is your payment.
Find %s
Trapper is looking for a specific firearm in perfect condition. Return to him if you find one.
One of my trappers is in the market for a specific firearm that I don't have available. Would you be able to track one down for me?
I need a %s. The trapper who wants it goes after dangerous game, so he needs it to be in excellent condition. I can pay you well if you find one.
Ah, perfect. This will do nicely. Here is the money I promised you.
Procure %s
Trapper says he will pay well if you can bring him %s.
I have a bounty out on a particular type of mutant. Are you interested?
Kill this mutant and bring me its %s and I will pay you well, stalker.
Ah, another threat eliminated and a new decoration for the camp. Well done, stalker.
Find %s
%s are required by Nitro to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need new tools, stalker, something that is hard to come by in the Zone. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Perfect! This is just what I need, stalker. If you need any of your equipment fine-tuned, I can now do it properly.
Find %s
%s are required by Nitro to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
Find %s
%s are required by Nitro to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
Special Delivery
You need to deliver a message. How did you get caught up in the middle of this?
Alright, I have a very simple job for you. I need you to deliver a message to my pal, Ashot. He needs his PDA fixed - tell him to bring it over here.
Haha, we were just playing a prank on you, stalker. I can't believe you put up with this shit for so long.
I'm here to deliver a message.
Scanning Field
Get an anomalous scanner.
Take the scanner to the anomalous field.
Take the scanner to the anomalous field.
Place the scanner.
Report on the implementation.

Our group is trying their hardest to find out what sort of relationship the emissions and the artefacts have by conducting experiments on anomalous formations. But, our research team isn't quite the most qualified, so we urgently need a volunteer for our mission. I need you to take this advanced scanner and place it near the marked anomalies, the data will be sent to our computers.
I can see that the scanner is working as intended. Thank you stalker, I am very grateful.
Find %s
The technician at the depot has asked me to bring %s.
Our base was set up here recently, but the lack of tools for our brothers has been acute. Will you find a set of basic tools for the benefit of the brotherhood? It would be invaluable.
Our base was set up here recently, but the lack of tools for our brothers has been acute. Will you find a set of basic tools for the benefit of the brotherhood? It would be invaluable.
Excellent. This will help us gain a foothold and grow in strength... I believe you deserve a discount.
Find %s
The technician at the depot has asked me to bring %s.

Fighting has shown that our weapons are marginally inferior to those of the infidels, among which exist capable technicians. I require tools for fine work to save our brothers from such inferiorities. Will you help, brother?

Fighting has shown that our weapons are marginally inferior to those of the infidels, among which exist capable technicians. I require tools for fine work to save our brothers from such inferiorities. Will you help, brother?
Good work. The equipment supplied to our brothers will prove to be dominant over all others in the area... You will be getting an additional reduction in fees.
Find %s
The technician at the depot has asked me to bring %s.
We will be able to surpass them all, brother! To accomplish that, I require tools for calibrating our weapons. Please, locate a set and bring it to me.
We will be able to surpass them all, brother! To accomplish that, I require tools for calibrating our weapons. Please, locate a set and bring it to me.
It is settled. With these recent discoveries, we shall conquer the surrounding areas. From here on out, my services for you will be provided to the best of my capability.
Find %s
The tech gangster has asked me to bring him %s.
Stalkers snatched everything and set up defenses at Yanov, those fuckers. We ain't got shit! Need some tools, man. Get me some, yeah?
Stalkers snatched everything and set up defenses at Yanov, those fuckers. We ain't got shit! Need some tools, man. Get me some, yeah?
Ah, beautiful! Someone's getting a discount.
Find %s
The tech gangster has asked me to bring him %s.
Listen, I don't wanna bother you too much and all, but could you just bring one more kit here? Need a better kit to improve our shit, you know? It's hard for us here without the right upgrades, heh.
Listen, I don't wanna bother you too much and all, but could you just bring one more kit here? Need a better kit to improve our shit, you know? It's hard for us here without the right upgrades, heh.
Thanks, man. You're a real guy, you know that?
Find %s
The tech gangster has asked me to bring him %s.s
Hey, buddy, the two other sets of tools you brought us is really helpin', but I need the best o' the best. You know... the shit that'll make 'em go, "oooh, yeeeah..."
Hey, buddy, the two other sets of tools you brought us is really helpin', but I need the best o' the best. You know... the shit that'll make 'em go, "oooh, yeeeah..."
Well, fuck me sideways! What a rarity... a real rarity. I'll give you another discount, you deserve it. Thanks, bro.
Find %s
%s is required by Bonesetter to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Great job! I own you big time.
